dmca.title: Spanish company claims defamatory and offensive material in Google search
dmca.body:
We request the suppression of the specified URL because we have found some offending pages with our Google search results about our company. We have found it on Google's search "revelance":

The Google website where the information above appears: Google.es, Spanish web pages

Identify our country of residence and citizenship: Espana

Identify precisely the information that you claim violates your rights under applicable law (the "Unlawful Material"). Some information contained in the forums:


The reason that we believe the information indicated above violates our rights or is illegal under applicable law. "The search result URL identified above contains defamatory information about my company that is not permitted under the laws of the country in which I reside or I am a citizen"

Information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact us
[redacted]
